name: Avatar's Music Classroom
description:
Avatar's Music Classroom is a fan game based on Ultima VII: The Black Gate, released in 1992 by Origin Systems. Contains two sub-games "Avatar's Music Classroom" and "The Bread Gate part 2".

Inspired by music instrument playing in the previous games of the series, this game is all about music and rhythm, while sharing the same story setting as my previous fan game "The Bread Gate". 

The interactions are mostly for keyboard, mouse needed at times. Please don't use numpads if possible, my keyboard doesn't have numpad so I cannot test that.

Developed in Unity by yulotomorrow in 2021. Assets including art and sound effects are mostly made by me, some are from Fungus.

The Avatar in this game is my OC version.

Buy Ultima VII at https://www.gog.com/game/ultima_7_complete 

Get Exult at http://exult.sourceforge.net/index.php

BGM: Stones by David Watson and Kathleen Jones; Love Theme by Raymond Benson, both appeared in Ultima series.
